name: Veba
description: For parents that manually track breastmilk or formula expiration, we have a device that turns a baby bottle into a smart bottle; automatically notifying parents of when the milk or formula has expired and is no longer safe to give the baby.
one_liner: For parents that manually track breastmilk or formula expiration, we have a device that turns a baby bottle into a smart bottle; automatically notifying parents of when the milk or formula has expired and is no longer safe to give the baby.
